entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json GetConverterFromAttribute need to be annotated for native aot #68878
  • Reenable assert for a case when mapping an R2R PE failed on OSX #68873
  • [API Proposal]: char helpers for common ASCII categories #68868
    7.0.0
  • Any downside to getting the httpClient from the HttpClientFactory in Startup.cs? #68866
  • System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse very low performance with incorrect XML #68850
    Future
  • [mono] mono crash on ios #68849

Closed

  • Testing issue-labeler bot #68872
  • .NET 7 osx-arm64 single-file crashing with sigsegv #67062
  • Having Issue Running System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection Methods in .NET 6 - Alpine Linux (Docker) #63759
  • Some regex errors are misleading and could be improved #39075
    Future
  • Visual Studio design time build failing to recognize essential types like Void, IDisposable, Enum in test code #68862
    7.0.0
  • Align API surface of immutable collections and their corresponding builder types #822
    7.0.0
  • Cross-targeting to x64 on an arm64 machine with an upgraded arm64 runtime fails #67316
    7.0.0
  • Signing certificate with ECDsa works in Windows, invalid signature in Linux #64515
  • ecdh sharekey #67832
    Future
  • OOME in RegexIgnoreCaseTests.Unicode_IgnoreCase_Tests on osx-arm64 #68545
  • [API Proposal]: new<TArgument>() generic constraints for constructor with parameters #68858
  • RegularExpressions Groups are assigned even when conditionally not supposed to, unlike PowerShell #28427
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #63931
    7.0.0
  • ApiCompat errors when building System.Runtime inside Visual Studio #68699
    7.0.0
  • Make DynamicMethod invokable "directly" #68791
  • Helix tests failing during reporting with Permission Denied on run.py.log #68715
    7.0.0
  • WasmBuildTests job failing workitem 'Workloads-.CleanTests' #67298
  • Add String.Format overloads to avoid unnecessary allocations #14484
    Future
  • [release/6.0] SSL and authentication failures affecting branch CI #67946
    6.0.x
  • `dotnet build` randomly exiting with code `139` #68848
  • [x86] SequenceEqual returns false for equal spans #65292
  • CancellationTokenSource.CancelAfter(TimeSpan delay) throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException for valid TimeSpan values #68841
  • [wasm][aot] Assertion failure - `unexpected GC filler class` in `System.Runtime.Numerics.Tests`, `System.CodeDom.Tests` #63749
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed the yp_spin_count_unit to be a factor of the original_spin_count_unit rather than a continually increasing value #68879
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix missing metadata for ThreadPool Event #68876
    area-System.Threading
  • Use Docker images from mcr.microsoft.com in EnterpriseTests #68875
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1752382 #68870
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Flag to track IGs whose alignment was removed #68869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Disable ZipFile_Unix.UnixCreateSetsPermissionsInExternalAttributes on Apple OSs #68867
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Update message for unsupported char marshalling #68865
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Apply changes from #63356 #68864
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix VSTest and dotnet test broken on .NETFramework #68863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update generators.targets #68860
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete stale IgnoreCaseRelation regex tests #68857
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Stop escaping ' and " in generated regex XML comments #68856
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Fixing wrong stack size calculation in the mono interpreter for back edges #68855
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Delete some invalid asserts and code from `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #68853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Single source of truth for System.Diagnostics.Processes annotations and docs #68852
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Do not fold relocatable constants into displacements #68851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Deprecate ICU ucol_safeClone and support ucol_clone #68847
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Tweak Regex comparison to improve subsequent bounds check removals #68846
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Fix singlefile on OSX ARM64 #68845
    area-Single-File
  • Reenable 4244 #68615
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Use new image to run debugger tests on firefox #68859
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #68050
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #68352
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.6
  • Clean up some Regex error messages #68861
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Align API surface of immutable collections and their corresponding builder types #66550
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] add support for parsing Unified TLS hello #68425
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Handle parameterless ctors in structs in STJ's ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor #67901
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Use x64 directory if running x64 process on arm64 apphost #68583
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.6
  • Perf Update framework var name #68827
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Minor tweaks to host tracing around registered install location #68843
    area-Host
  • Use switch over a span in a few more places #68831
    area-System.Security
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update iOS result and post command #68788
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove some unnecessary StringBuilder use #68768
    area-Meta
  • Fix a few TODOs in regex #68679
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Improve rendering of some negated sets #68608
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][wasm] Pin corlib exceptions after creation. #68801
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Improving the 64-bit number formatting to better match the 32-bit algorithm #68795
    area-System.Numerics
  • WIP: CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Add a four-element AsyncLocalValueMap type #68790
    area-System.Threading, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Handle case to update loop tables when preheader is removed #68803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reset the bbNatLoopNum of block for removed loop #68804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • Removal of IBC infrastructure #68717
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Replace invalid sourcegen debug assertion with runtime check #68828
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Physical value numbering #68712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68706
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • Fix a few more API compat inconsistencies #68834
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move `CustomTypeMarshaller` APIs to `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling` #68842
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add basic fake NTLM server to test NTAuthentication round-trip scenarios #65611
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • ARM64 - Consolidate 'msub' and 'madd' logic #68363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] GetTotalPauseDuration implementation #68835
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Fix passing too small args for PUTARG_STK on macOS arm64 ABI #68113
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Refactor of getProperties mechanism #68486
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Dynamically sized stacks in EventPipe buffer manager #68134
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] add support to build for ppc64le architecture #68802
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68379
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move away from exposing internal EventPipe wait handle to EventPipeEventDispatcher. #68320
    area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • Improve impPopCallArgs #68736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Throw from MsQuicImplementationProvider if not supported. #68833
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • refactor SslStream internals #68678
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Added the fix to make use of the heap hard limit instead of the region range while using large pages. #68629
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please provide a way to publish from a specific build directory (Azure pipelines) #25208
  • Emre #25202

Closed

  • `dotnet add "x.csproj" package y` adds NuGet package instead of updating existing `<PackageReference>` #25209
  • different build result between dotnet cli and visual studio 2022 #25165
  • [workloads] Confusing errors during installation #24815

PullRequests

Merged

  • Port changes from Main for fixing binary version issues. #25104
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Version updates for compliance checks #25103
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port changes from Main for fixing binary version issues. #25087
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Assign names to arguments for nuget commands #25001
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux

Updated

  • Pin the compiler version in RSG to an exact version #24598
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.2xx
  • bump WarningLevel to 7 for .NET 7 #24826
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Use System.Environment to obtain user HOME dir #25117
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Next two test projects to move to helix #25197
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Compatibility.Common.targets #25132
    Area-Compatibility
  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Immutable Types #2543
  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Compound assignment in object initializer and `with` expression #5176
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Go to Implementation should consider generic type arguments #61130
  • Integration test failure: CSharpEncapsulateField #61128
  • `Convert to 'Program.Main' style program` should keep leading trivia inside `Main` method #61126
  • "Convert to raw string" should work for interpolated verbatim strings #61124
  • Remove IsBlocking properties from CodeRefactoringContext and CodeFixContext #61122
  • Hard select default item from IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource when filter text is empty #61120
    17.3

Closed

  • Make Generate parameter refactoring aware of CancellationToken convention #60842
    Backlog
  • Generate better IL for `(a, b) = (b, a)` #61127

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for implementing static members in derived interfaces. #61134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Adjust tests to ensure abstract statics are not supported in C#10. #61133
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Handle some possible null-references #61132
    Area-Compilers
  • StructuredAnalyzerConfigOptions #61131
    Area-IDE
  • assert property is override when reporting `ERR_AutoPropertyMustOverrideSet` #61125
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Revert to pass isBlocking as a parameter #61123
    Area-IDE
  • Hard select item from default source when filter text is empty #61121
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Enable declaration, implementation(in non-interfaces) and consumption of virtual static members. #60965
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Generate parameter before cancellation token in async methods #61129
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61068
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix F# smart indentation #61115
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61117
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions (part2). #61111
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #61085
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Require overriding all accessors #61114
    Area-Compilers
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll support for "Convert to raw string" refactoring #61105
    Area-IDE
  • Add EA layer for ASP.NET Core. #60948
    Area-IDE
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Backport template fixes to 6.0.xxx #41519
    6.0.x
  • Cookie authentication handler calls `SessionStore.RenewAsync()` on sign in with expired session. #41516
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #41515
  • Blazor Server Windows Authentication : Trust Relationship between this workstation and the primary domain failed. #41512
  • Allow for additional WebApplication configuration for testing #41511
  • .Net 5 to .Net 6 migration breaking integration tests in docker, works ok in local #41509
  • Question: In Blazor Wasm, is it possible to capture the generated html from a Blazor component? #41508
  • Automatic validation with ApiController does not work as expected #41505

Closed

  • Large byte array Blazor and JS interop #41490
  • Kestrel uses exception for control flow when handling the `"Connection": "close"` header. #41206
    7.0-preview5
  • 'Unable to load shared library 'kernel32.dll' or one of its dependencies. #41417
  • Update `RouteHandlerFilterContext.Parameters` API #40514
    7.0-preview5
  • Perf improvement: https, plainTextSansFilter #41472
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_actix #41497
  • Custom framework based on blazor server #41510
  • Blazor Web App running using WPF using webassembly question #41488
  • CSS isolation support in ASP.NET Core 6.0 for img tag #41507
  • dotnet dev-certs - UntrustedRoot #41503
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #41482
  • Perf regression: mapaction #41498

PullRequests

Created

  • Add dotnet dev-jwts tool #41520
  • Set Content-Type more accurately in SignalR TS client #41517
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • Update SPA template JS dependencies #41514
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 3.1.x

Merged

  • Handle arm64 in ANCMIISExpress msi #41034
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • release/6.0 port of abort handling #41360
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • Allow Multiple Wildcard Prefix Server Names of the Same Length in SNI Configuration #41402
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Zero byte reads support for EnableBuffering/FileBufferingReadStream #41410
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • Only load bcrypt.dll on Windows #41487
    area-dataprotection, 7.0-preview5
  • [release/6.0] Fix Component Governance alerts #41501
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix diff checks for ContentRoot and WebRoot #41182
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • Add support for RouteHandlerInvocationContext<> overloads #41406
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Surrogate argument list in Minimal APIs #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • Support minimal APIs & program/main together in Web API template #41499
    area-mvc
  • Fix MapPath and UsePathBase's use of implicit PathStrings #41382
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • Determine next log file number from directory on first run #41492
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Add redis startup error handling #41141
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview4
  • Spruce up OpenApiSchema generation #41468
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/5.0] Fix CompGov bugs #41179
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Fix component government bugs #41160
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Error when Http/1.0 attempts to upgrade #40006
    area-runtime
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add support for JSON transcoding unannotated methods #41493
    area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-trace: unhandled exception results in a broken trace #2954
    .NET 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression: Splash screen and BackgroundImageSource not working #6838
  • Add Android permission documentation to every API which requires this permission #6833
  • Cannot publish freshly created MAUI app as documented #6831
  • Loading native iOS library #6830
  • FlexLayout doesn't account for children size #6826
  • [Android] SwipeItem Unexpectedly Turns IconImageSource Into Only A Cutout When Setting BackgroundColor #6825
  • Show output for Release applications on Android #6824
  • Document how to customize WebView settings in a Blazor MAUI app #6823
    6.0.300
  • Navigating via tabs and then scrolling in listview causes app to crash #6822
  • Consolidate Background properties and expose ImageBrush #6821
    .NET 7
  • Backwards navigation is not triggering ApplyQueryAttributes #6817
  • #elif WINDOWS doesn't work #6815
  • Onboard to source.dot.net #6814
    .NET 7
  • .NET MAUI RC 2 app using SaxonCS NuGet library runs fine on Windows but crashes with "[libc] Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR)" on Android #6811
  • [Windows] ContentView with ContentPresenter measured and arranged incorrectly #6808
  • Border Rendered Incorrectly While giving Corner Radius in some cases #6805
  • Unable to customize the UI Automation Name property of CollectionView items #6803
  • Label sometimes displays hugely wrong font size and spacing #6801
  • Review FlexLayoutManager measurement for possible performance improvements #6798
    .NET 7
  • Support unconstrained measurement in FlexLayoutManager #6796
    .NET 7

Closed

  • Toolbar overlaps with Android notification bar #6392
    6.0.300
  • Editor AutoSize on Text Change Surpass the border around it #5991
    6.0.300
  • FlexLayout has no height in ListView #6380
    6.0.300
  • [Android] - ScrollView does not scroll since RC2 when the contained StackLayout has a margin #6602
    6.0.300
  • BarTextColour remains [white] for ToolBarItem on Android #6523
    6.0.300
  • Side menu (left and right) like Shell Flyout but for every page (standalone) #5958
  • Add ability to use maui-blazor from http context #5639
  • Issues with collection view displaying only first item and scrolling crashes app #6484
    6.0.300
  • iOS Crash on populating CollectionView with data #6134
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Crash on IOS adding items to an ObservableCollection after Render #4756
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] BlazorWebView not provide "MediaPlaybackRequiresUserGesture" #3033
    .NET 7
  • Blazor MAUI project support linked file properly #3887
    .NET 7
  • MediaPlayer or VLC Player #6764
  • [bug][android]ModalPage will not work properly #6532
    6.0.300
  • What is the difference between HapticFeedback.Current and .Default? #6799
  • FormattedString Spans overlapping #4838
    6.0.300
  • CollectionView items not rendered when using EmptyView #6119
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] AppThemeBinding survives longer then it should if Binding type is OneTime #3188
    6.0.300
  • RC2 Border.Stroke Shape is not fully displayed #6804
  • Video Splash Screen #2645
  • Crash while resizing window with grouped ListView #6132
    6.0.300
  • Flyout labels aren't vertically centered #5764
    6.0.300
  • [Android] Crash: Canvas trying to draw too large #3463
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • Force parent invalidation on Margin and LayoutOptions changes #6836
  • Reenable CA1416 in Essentials #6835
  • [android] update AOT profiles #6834
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix the device tests #6832
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300
  • Visibility should affect the container if there is one #6828
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • Add a locked flyout immediately to the view #6827
    area/shell 🐢
  • Add default BackgroundColor to controls in Styles #6820
    area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • Show SearchHandler on Windows #6818
    area/controls 🎮
  • iOS modals use `Window.ModalNavigationManager` vs `Application.NavigationProxy` #6813
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert
  • Fix Share does not block when awaited on iOS #6812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.2.6.1 to 1.3.0 #6809
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Unit tests for FlexLayoutManager #6800
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Tizen] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler for Tizen #6795
    area/controls 🎮
  • Remove Frame arrange/measure overrides #6794
    area/layout 🔲, control-frame, 6.0.300

Merged

  • Reinstate Forms hack for unconstrained FlexLayout measurement #6797
    area/layout 🔲
  • Lay out ScrollView inset view at correct size on Android #6816
    area/layout 🔲
  • Modify Package.appxmanifest templates to include placeholder values and overwrite these values in the GeneratePackageAppxManifest task #6829
  • Merge the BackgroundImageSource into Background #6819
    t/bug, t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300
  • [GH-6523] Fix toolbar text color #6765
    area/navigation 🧭, 6.0.300
  • Remove `Current` from HapticFeedback #6802
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS] Observable collection events not firing in the correct order with CollectionView.BeginInvokeOnMainThread #6546
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.300
  • Base the Modal Size and position off the root window view #6792
  • Fix overlapping text with Label spans #6789
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300
  • [Android] Always make sure to stop observing the old adapter #6807
  • [Tizen] Bump Tizen.UIExtensions from 0.6.0-pre1 to 0.8.0-pre1 #6615
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen

Updated

  • [Android] Update the adapter used by RecyclerViewScrollListener #6601
    area/collectionview 📃, partner/android, 6.0.300
  • [Windows] Correctly size the ImageButton BitmapImage #6663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Extensions pack #5918
    do-not-merge, area/setup 🪄

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Temporal Tables HIDDEN (INMEMORY ISSUE?) #27949
  • Investigation into aggregates, supported operators and multiple enumerable parameters #27948
  • TPC: Allow DbSet for abstract types #27947
  • TPC: Bug while seeding #27945

Closed

  • Query: inconsistent behavior between relational and InMemory/L2O for queries grouping by a constant #19683
    7.0.0
  • GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using null/default values #27801
    7.0.0
  • Queryable.Count throws exception when used with GroupBy and Select with constructor arguments #27796
    7.0.0
  • GroupBy one field, selecting a sub collection for the data that is grouped and paging the groupby return no result for the sub collection. #27721
    7.0.0
  • sub-select + group-by leads to InvalidCastException #23601
    7.0.0
  • Bug report: When Substring is used in GroupBy, the query is not created correctly 6.0.2 #27433
    7.0.0
  • Stop referring to ungrouped columns from outer query in subquery #27266
    7.0.0
  • Relational: GroupBy aggregate lifting #27132
    7.0.0
  • Why are AppendIdentityWhereCondition and AppendRowsAffectedWhereCondition abstract and rest is virtual? #10431
    7.0.0-preview5
  • Please consider adding two methods to the DbConnectionInterceptor Creating/Created #23087
    7.0.0-preview5

PullRequests

Merged

  • Query: Translate aggregate over grouping element in separate pass #27931
    providers-beware
  • Query: Add TPC test bases #27946
  • Add creation and disposal to connection interception #27920
  • Refactor UpdateSqlGenerator to separate select logic #27902

Updated

  • [6.0.x] Reset read count on RelationalDataReader #27852
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.6
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient and SQLitePCLRaw #27932
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Allow to set provider value comparer when configuring value conversion #27942
